title: Sri Lanka Highlands
story: A journey through the misty tea plantations and rolling hills of Sri Lanka's central highlands. Capturing the golden hour light dancing across endless green valleys, and the quiet moments of tea pickers at work.

images.caption: Golden rays breaking through morning mist over the tea estates
A tea picker's hands carefully selecting the finest leaves
The endless rolling hills of the central highlands

title: Urban Colombo
story: The vibrant chaos and hidden serenity of Sri Lanka's commercial capital. From bustling street markets to quiet colonial architecture, Colombo tells a story of tradition meeting modernity.

images.caption: The colorful chaos of Pettah's morning market
British-era building bathed in evening light
Families gathering at Galle Face Green during sunset
